docs.snippet: Jack Bigel, the labor consultant, was in the midsweep of his speech, making the rhetorical equivalent of a slamdunk shot through a basketball hoop at the expense of City Comptroller Harrison J. Goldin, when Governor Carey called timeout....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jack Bigel, the labor consultant, was in the midsweep of his speech, making the rhetorical equivalent of a slamdunk shot through a basketball hoop at the expense of City Comptroller Harrison J. Goldin, when Governor Carey called timeout.
docs.abstract: About NY Column describes first Emergency Financial Control Bd session conducted in public under new open-meeting law; small group of militant demonstrators has to be evicted; some comments by Mayor Beame, Repr Edward Koch, NYC Comptroller Harrison J Goldin, NYS Comptroller Arthur Levitt and union consultant Jack Bigel noted; Gov Carey chaired meeting

headline.main: About New York; The Sun Shines on the Control Board

docs.snippet: Any weekend in New York is a potential jazz festival, but this weekend offers an abundance of riches for the jazz lover, with every stylistic persuasion well represented....

headline.main: New York Is a Jazz Festival

docs.snippet: "Oscar Hammerstein Revisited" is the 16th in the series of collections of lesser known songs by the more celebrated contributors, to the musical theater that Ben Bagley has produced. On the face of it, it would seem the least promising because Mr....
docs.lead_paragraph: "Oscar Hammerstein Revisited" is the 16th in the series of collections of lesser known songs by the more celebrated contributors, to the musical theater that Ben Bagley has produced. On the face of it, it would seem the least promising because Mr. Hammerstein, although he was a painstaking craftsman as a lyricist, was not noted for the light touch that has enlivened Mr. Bagley's better "revisiteds." Moreover, many of Mr. Hammerstein's less ...

docs.snippet: HANDIWORK Two small-scale exhibitions of art exotica have opened quietly, for those interested in something a little different. One show is a multimedia collection of metal and wood sculptures, collages and ink on paper by Wolfgang Roth, on view T...
docs.lead_paragraph: HANDIWORK Two small-scale exhibitions of art exotica have opened quietly, for those interested in something a little different. One show is a multimedia collection of metal and wood sculptures, collages and ink on paper by Wolfgang Roth, on view Tuesday through Saturday (10:30 A.M. to 5 P.M.) until Jan. 22 at the Touchstone Gallery, 118 East 64th Street.
